title: Keep-It-Handy 2 x 10g Unscented Stain Remover Pac
features: Versatile Stain Removal: Tackles a wide range of stains on all fabric types
Convenient Packaging: 2 x 10g pacs for easy dosing and storage
Unscented Formula: Gentle on sensitive skin and ideal for those with allergies
Eco-Friendly: Regular formulation with no harsh chemicals, suitable for septic tanks
Keep-It-Handy Quality: Trusted brand ensuring effective stain removal and customer satisfaction
description: Experience the convenience of our 2-pack Keep-It-Handy Unscented Stain Remover Pacs, each containing 10 grams of powerful, regular formulation stain-fighting power. Ideal for all skin types and fabrics, these unscented, laundry detergent pacs are perfect for those with sensitivities or preferences for fragrance-free products. Each pac is designed to tackle specific stains, making laundry day a breeze. Keep your whites white and colors vibrant with our effective, easy-to-use stain remover pacs.
